dcterms:creator: Seunghyun Park
Seung Shin
Bado Lee
Junyeop Lee
Jaeheung Surh

dcterms:description: COnsolidated Receipt Dataset for Post-OCR Parsing is a receipt dataset containing a total of 1000 samples with 800 for training, 100 for validation, and 100 for test. It defines 30 classes grouped in 5 superclasses.
dcterms:title: CORD

dcterms:creator: Guillaume Jaume
Hazim Kemal Ekenel
Jean-Philippe Thiran
dcterms:description: Form Understanding in Noisy Scanned Documents is a form dataset with a total of 199 samples, making it much smaller than other datasets evaluated. 149 samples are used for training and the reported F1-score is on the remaining 50.
dcterms:title: FUNSD

dcterms:creator: Adam W Harley
Alex Ufkes
Konstantinos G Derpanis
dcterms:description: RVL-CDIP is a dataset containing 400,000 images equally split across 16 classes. It is used for document classification tasks.
dcterms:title: RVL-CDIP

dcterms:creator: David D. Lewis
Gady Agam
Shlomo Argamon
Ophir Frieder
David A. Grossman
Jefferson Heard
dcterms:description: IIT-CDIP is a document collection containing 5 million scanned pages used for pre-training and extracting text, word-level, and line-level bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: IIT-CDIP
